ï»¿What is GDP or gross domestic product?
And why should you even care?
It's cars, clothes, doctors, hairdressers even.
Let me explain, some people produce goods like cars or clothes,...
...others produce services like doctors or hairdressers,...
...so if you add up the value of goods and services, you get gross domestic product.
If you add up the income of all the United States in one year, you get US GDP.
